name: "Celebration of an Ad-Hoc Performance"
description: A small stage designed specifically for impromptu performances during gatherings and parties. It was made using high-quality Cypress Wood and adorned with cute decorations, and can promote a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere.\nFontainian parties often involve lively performances, and this lightweight, compact, and easy-to-set-up stage has been designed to meet such demands. Therefore, this stage, along with the decorations on it and the other signs of use, has witnessed countless moments of Fontainian joy.
